text: Preparing the Pitcher Measure the ingredients. Pour the ingredients (except the garnish) into a pitcher that can hold 100 ounces. Stir the cream of coconut thoroughly before adding it into the pitcher. Stir the ingredients. Ensure everything is mixed thoroughly. Refrigerate the pitcher. Allow the mixture to chill in the refrigerator until ready to serve. This drink can also be served immediately. Serving the Cocktails Pour the mixture into tall glasses. Distribute the pitcher mixture evenly between 8-ounce tall glasses. Garnish the drinks. Add a slice of fresh mango on the side of each glass.
